ud5.5:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati pubbarame migaramatupasade.
ud5.5:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena bhagava tadahuposathe bhikkhusanghaparivuto nisinno hoti.
ud5.5:2.1: Atha kho ayasma anando abhikkantaya rattiya, nikkhante pathame yame, utthayasana ekamsam uttarasangam karitva yena bhagava tenanjalim panametva bhagavantam etadavoca:
ud5.5:2.2: “abhikkanta, bhante, ratti; nikkhanto pathamo yamo; ciranisinno bhikkhusangho;
ud5.5:3.1: Dutiyampi kho ayasma anando abhikkantaya rattiya, nikkhante majjhime yame, utthayasana ekamsam uttarasangam karitva yena bhagava tenanjalim panametva bhagavantam etadavoca:
ud5.5:3.2: “abhikkanta, bhante, ratti; nikkhanto majjhimo yamo; ciranisinno bhikkhusangho;
ud5.5:4.1: Tatiyampi kho ayasma anando abhikkantaya rattiya, nikkhante pacchime yame, uddhaste arune, nandimukhiya rattiya utthayasana ekamsam uttarasangam karitva yena bhagava tenanjalim panametva bhagavantam etadavoca:
ud5.5:4.2: “abhikkanta, bhante, ratti; nikkhanto pacchimo yamo; uddhasto aruno; nandimukhi ratti; ciranisinno bhikkhusangho;
ud5.5:5.2: “kam nu kho bhagava puggalam sandhaya evamaha:
ud5.5:5.4: Atha kho ayasma mahamoggallano sabbavantam bhikkhusangham cetasa ceto paricca manasakasi.
ud5.5:5.5: Addasa kho ayasma mahamoggallano tam puggalam dussilam papadhammam asucim sankassarasamacaram paticchannakammantam assamanam samanapatinnam abrahmacarim brahmacaripatinnam antoputim avassutam kasambujatam majjhe bhikkhusanghassa nisinnam.
ud5.5:5.6: Disvana utthayasana yena so puggalo tenupasankami; upasankamitva tam puggalam etadavoca:
ud5.5:5.9: Evam vutte, so puggalo tunhi ahosi.
ud5.5:6.1: Dutiyampi kho ayasma mahamoggallano tam puggalam etadavoca:
ud5.5:6.5: tatiyampi kho so puggalo tunhi ahosi.
ud5.5:7.1: Atha kho ayasma mahamoggallano tam puggalam bahayam gahetva bahidvarakotthaka nikkhametva sucighatikam datva yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam etadavoca:
ud5.5:7.6: Yava bahagahanapi nama so moghapuriso agamessati”ti.
ud5.5:8.2: “na danaham, bhikkhave, ito param uposatham karissami, patimokkham uddisissami.
ud5.5:8.3: Tumheva dani, bhikkhave, ito param uposatham kareyyatha, patimokkham uddiseyyatha.
ud5.5:8.4: Atthanametam, bhikkhave, anavakaso yam tathagato aparisuddhaya parisaya uposatham kareyya, patimokkham uddiseyya.
ud5.5:9.1: Atthime, bhikkhave, mahasamudde acchariya abbhuta dhamma, ye disva disva asura mahasamudde abhiramanti.
ud5.5:10.1: Mahasamuddo, bhikkhave, anupubbaninno anupubbapono anupubbapabbharo, na ayatakeneva papato.
ud5.5:10.2: Yampi, bhikkhave, mahasamuddo anupubbaninno anupubbapono anupubbapabbharo na ayatakeneva papato;
ud5.5:10.3: ayam, bhikkhave, mahasamudde pathamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, yam disva disva asura mahasamudde abhiramanti.
ud5.5:11.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, mahasamuddo thitadhammo velam nativattati.
ud5.5:11.2: Yampi, bhikkhave, mahasamuddo thitadhammo velam nativattati;
ud5.5:11.3: ayam, bhikkhave, mahasamudde dutiyo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, yam disva disva asura mahasamudde abhiramanti.
ud5.5:12.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, mahasamuddo na matena kunapena samvasati. Yam hoti mahasamudde matam kunapam tam khippameva tiram vaheti, thalam ussareti.
ud5.5:12.2: Yampi, bhikkhave, mahasamuddo na matena kunapena samvasati, yam hoti mahasamudde matam kunapam tam khippameva tiram vaheti thalam ussareti;
ud5.5:12.3: ayam, bhikkhave, mahasamudde tatiyo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, yam disva disva asura mahasamudde abhiramanti.
ud5.5:13.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, ya kaci mahanadiyo, seyyathidam—ganga yamuna aciravati sarabhu mahi, ta mahasamuddam patva jahanti purimani namagottani; ‘mahasamuddo’tveva sankham gacchanti.
ud5.5:13.2: Yampi, bhikkhave, ya kaci mahanadiyo, seyyathidam—ganga yamuna aciravati sarabhu mahi ta mahasamuddam patva jahanti purimani namagottani, ‘mahasamuddo’tveva sankham gacchanti;
ud5.5:13.3: ayam, bhikkhave, mahasamudde catuttho acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, yam disva disva asura mahasamudde abhiramanti.
ud5.5:14.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, ya ca loke savantiyo mahasamuddam appenti, ya ca antalikkha dhara papatanti, na tena mahasamuddassa unattam va purattam va pannayati.
ud5.5:14.2: Yampi, bhikkhave, ya ca loke savantiyo mahasamuddam appenti, ya ca antalikkha dhara papatanti, na tena mahasamuddassa unattam va purattam va pannayati;
ud5.5:14.3: ayam, bhikkhave, mahasamudde pancamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, yam disva disva asura mahasamudde abhiramanti.
ud5.5:15.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, mahasamuddo ekaraso lonaraso.
ud5.5:15.3: ayam, bhikkhave, mahasamudde chattho acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, yam disva disva asura mahasamudde abhiramanti.
ud5.5:16.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, mahasamuddo bahuratano anekaratano. Tatrimani ratanani, seyyathidam—mutta mani veluriyo sankho sila pavalam rajatam jatarupam lohitango masaragallam.
ud5.5:16.2: Yampi, bhikkhave, mahasamuddo bahuratano anekaratano, tatrimani ratanani, seyyathidam—mutta mani veluriyo sankho sila pavalam rajatam jatarupam lohitango masaragallam;
ud5.5:16.3: ayam, bhikkhave, mahasamudde sattamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, yam disva disva asura mahasamudde abhiramanti.
ud5.5:17.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, mahasamuddo mahatam bhutanam avaso. Tatrime bhuta—timi timingalo timitimingalo asura naga gandhabba. Santi mahasamudde yojanasatikapi attabhava, dviyojanasatikapi attabhava, tiyojanasatikapi attabhava, catuyojanasatikapi attabhava, pancayojanasatikapi attabhava.
ud5.5:17.2: Yampi, bhikkhave, mahasamuddo mahatam bhutanam avaso, tatrime bhuta—timi timingalo timitimingalo asura naga gandhabba, santi mahasamudde yojanasatikapi attabhava dviyojanasatikapi attabhava …pe… pancayojanasatikapi attabhava;
ud5.5:17.3: ayam, bhikkhave, mahasamudde atthamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, yam disva disva asura mahasamudde abhiramanti.
ud5.5:17.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, attha mahasamudde acchariya abbhuta dhamma ye disva disva asura mahasamudde abhiramanti.
ud5.5:18.1: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, imasmim dhammavinaye attha acchariya abbhuta dhamma, ye disva disva bhikkhu imasmim dhammavinaye abhiramanti.
ud5.5:19.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, mahasamuddo anupubbaninno anupubbapono anupubbapabbharo, na ayatakeneva papato;

ud5.5:19.3: Yampi, bhikkhave, imasmim dhammavinaye anupubbasikkha anupubbakiriya anupubbapatipada, na ayatakeneva annapativedho;

ud5.5:20.3: Yampi, bhikkhave, maya savakanam sikkhapadam pannattam tam mama savaka jivitahetupi natikkamanti;

ud5.5:21.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, mahasamuddo na matena kunapena samvasati; yam hoti mahasamudde matam kunapam tam khippameva tiram vaheti, thalam ussareti;
ud5.5:21.2: evamevam kho, bhikkhave, yo so puggalo dussilo papadhammo asuci sankassarasamacaro paticchannakammanto assamano samanapatinno abrahmacari brahmacaripatinno antoputi avassuto kasambujato, na tena sangho samvasati; atha kho nam khippameva sannipatitva ukkhipati. ud5.5:21.4: ayam, bhikkhave, imasmim dhammavinaye tatiyo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, yam disva disva bhikkhu imasmim dhammavinaye abhiramanti.

ud5.5:27.1: Atha kho bhagava etamattham viditva tayam velayam imam udanam udanesi:
